passage_text: Salt and pepper, to taste. Place chuck steak on large sheet of foil in baking pan. Combine the mushroom and onion soups and spread over meat. Quarter the potatoes and carrots and arrange around steak. Sprinkle with salt and pepper.

To roast a steak: 1  Preheat the oven to 300 degrees. 2  Season the steak. 3  Sear steak in a hot skillet for just a minute on each side. 4  Transfer steak to a wire rack on a rimmed baking sheet and place in the preheated oven. 5  Roast for 20 to 25 minutes, until desired doneness is achieved.

1 Cook the steaks in the oven for 40 to 45 minutes. 2  The steak will still look fairly uncooked when you remove it from the oven. 3  A thermometer inserted into the thickest part of the steak will reveal a cooking temperature five to ten degrees lower than the desired doneness.
